name: Bandar Udara Internasional Juanda
description: Juanda International Airport is the second-busiest airport in Indonesia after Jakarta Soekarno–Hatta International Airport based on the aircraft movements and passenger movements.  The airport takes its name after Djuanda Kartawidjaja, the last Prime Minister of Indonesia who had suggested development of this airport. It receives its code from *SU*ra*B*aya, where it’s located.
